function RIR_EP05_10()
    -- .承-4【2月第3週】「これで、いいんだ」
    SaveData.Title = "これで、いいんだ"

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    -- //SE：ノック音
PLAY_SE("SEb009.wav")
WAIT(800)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1189.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "It's Lira. Open up, Minato-kun." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Please leave. How many times do I have to say it? I don’t plan to run in the Princess Election anymore." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ This marks the fifth consecutive day of visits. And honestly, I think it’s understandable. ]])

    MSG([[ I suddenly sent a single message on RINE saying, “I’m withdrawing from the Princess Election,” and cut off contact, so this reaction is only natural. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course, I’m refusing all visitors except Lira. ]])

    MSG([[ As the second and third days passed, no one else came, and today it’s just Lira again. ]])

    MSG([[ I ignore all calls and RINE messages. It’s a patience that would make anyone want to cry. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "This is the only way left." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Wiping away tears, I desperately held back the urge to open the door. ]])

    MSG([[ I realize it’s the worst thing to do. But if I agree to everyone’s persuasion, the Himegami family might intervene again. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira might get hurt because of it. ]])

    MSG([[ Thinking that way, I just can’t open the door. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：病室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：ノック音
PLAY_SE("SEb009.wav")
WAIT(800)

    MSG([[ As the sunset began shining through the window, there was another knock. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (Lira... she still hasn’t given up.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I tried to stay still without reacting and carefully checked. But the visitor wasn’t Lira. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1012.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s your cute cousin, Akira-chan. Please open up!" ]])

    MSG([[ Oh, it’s Akira. Opening for Akira should be fine. ]])

    MSG([[ Still, since Akira is connected to Lira, it could be a trap. ]])

    MSG([[ I approached the door and confirmed there was only one presence outside. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "It’s really just you, Akira?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1013.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Is that some kind of jab at my social anxiety? There’s no way I could coordinate with anyone like that." ]])

    -- //BU：病院の廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG010aa")
    -- //BU：アキラ・私服（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Still cautious, I opened the door—indeed, only Akira was there. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira held a paper bag with an apple peeking out, puffing her cheeks in displeasure. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1014.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Isn’t this enough? I brought fruit for your visit, so let me in already." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Sorry... thanks, Akira." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I took the paper bag from Akira and invited her inside. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：病室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG009aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I prepared a chair for Akira and sat up on the bed. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira took an apple from the bag by the bed and bit into it while scrutinizing my condition. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1015.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Looks like your leg’s gotten a lot better." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, the pain’s finally lessening. Maybe in about a week, I can walk without support." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1016.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Oh, so you might just barely make it in time for the Princess Election. That’s good." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1152.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...About that..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I told Akira honestly everything about the incident with Nemesia. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira’s expression gradually changed from nodding along. ]])

    MSG([[ And when I finished explaining everything, she showed clear anger. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That’s unforgivable." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1153.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah... I can’t forgive Nemesia either. But opposing her is too risky." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That’s unforgivable, Minachin." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1154.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Yeah, I can't forgive myself eithe—" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1155.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Me!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I almost jumped up, and Akira pointed at me and continued. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Why are you worrying all by yourself? Are you stupid?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Are we really that unreliable? Don’t you trust Lira-pon? Do you think you alone can protect everyone important to you?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "No one said that…!? I’m just scared that Lira might get hurt—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Don’t you think Lira-pon is scared of you getting hurt just like you’re scared for her?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was speechless at Akira’s point. ]])

    MSG([[ She’s right. I’m sure if Lira were in my position, she’d make the same choice. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t believe Lira would try to protect me by sacrificing herself. I know that. But even so— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1158.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Even so, even so, I...!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I can’t lose anyone important to me anymore!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ My scream echoed in the sunset-lit hospital room. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira sighed softly and tossed the finished apple core into the trash. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You really are... clumsy, aren’t you? Well, neither I nor Lira-pon can talk much about other people." ]])

    MSG([[ She stood from the chair and trudged toward the door. ]])

    MSG([[ Watching her back made me feel strangely apologetic. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin, you always take on too much loss just because it makes everyone else happy. It’s about time you thought about your own happiness." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I hope the day comes when Minachin can lean on others more. At least on the people you trust." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.Linear)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Saying just that, Akira left the hospital room. ]])

    MSG([[ I peeked into the paper bag placed by the bed—inside were colorful fruits: pears, kiwis, grapefruits. ]])

    MSG([[ But they all had one thing in common. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN04fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1160.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "All of them need peeling with a knife before you can eat them... Is this a hint I should ask someone for help if I want to eat?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Understanding this indirect message from my cousin, I chuckled alone. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_11")
end
